Hi there! Whether you're exploring UG/PG programs or need admission help, I'm here for you. What would you like to know first?

Panjab University offers 200+ programs across disciplines:

• Undergraduate: B.A., B.Sc., B.Com, B.Tech, BBA, BCA, B.Pharm, MBBS, BDS, LLB, B.Ed
• Postgraduate: M.A., M.Sc., M.Com, M.Tech, MBA, MCA, M.Pharm, LLM, M.Ed
• Doctoral: Ph.D. in Science, Humanities, Engineering, Law, and Management

Which level or field interests you?

BTech at PU is a 4-year program with 5 specializations:

1. Computer Science & Engineering (CSE)
2. Electronics & Communication (ECE)
3. Mechanical Engineering
4. Civil Engineering
5. Electrical Engineering

Admission: Based on JEE Main + PU-CET
Fees: ₹92,460/year (General), ₹25,000 (Reserved)
Seats: 60 per branch
Campus: Sector 25

Want details on eligibility, fees, or placements?

BTech Eligibility Criteria:

• 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics
• Minimum 60% marks (55% for reserved categories)
• JEE Main qualification mandatory
• Age limit: 25 years (28 for reserved)
• Valid JEE Main scorecard

Additional Requirements:
• PU-CET exam (separate from JEE)
• Document verification
• Medical fitness certificate

BTech Fee Structure (Per Year):

• General Category: ₹92,460
• SC/ST/OBC: ₹25,000
• Hostel: ₹12,520 - ₹65,160 (optional)
• Mess: ₹6,020/semester
• Security Deposit: ₹5,000 (refundable)
• Lab Fee: ₹2,500

Total 4-year Cost:
• General: ₹3.7 L approx
• Reserved: ₹1.0 L approx

BTech Placement Statistics:

• Placement Rate: 95%
• Average CTC: ₹6-8 LPA
• Highest CTC: ₹45 LPA

Top Recruiters:
• IT: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Amazon, Google
• Core: L&T, Tata Steel, BHEL
• Consulting: Deloitte, Accenture

Placement Support:
• Training programs
• Mock interviews
• Resume building

Admission Process 2025:

Step 1: Register at ugadmissions.puchd.ac.in (UG) or onlineadmissions.puchd.ac.in (PG)
